base_description: Gray, L-shaped, cylindrical object with two parts.
part_description: Consists of two cylindrical parts; one vertical, one angled.
internal_interaction_description: The two cylindrical parts intersect perpendicularly, forming an L-shape. The vertical part supports the angled part, providing stability and structure. The intersection is seamless, suggesting a single-piece construction.
external_interaction_description: The object can be positioned on flat surfaces, potentially used as a support or connector. Its L-shape allows it to fit into corners or serve as a bracket, interacting with other objects by providing support or alignment.
